name: Cortellis Regulatory Intelligence
description:
Clarivate is a global leader in providing trusted insights and analytics to accelerate innovation.
  • It was formerly part of Thomson Reuters, specifically its Intellectual Property and Science division.
  • In 2016, this division was spun off and rebranded as Clarivate Analytics.
  • Cortellis Regulatory Intelligence (CRI) is a product offered by Clarivate that provides comprehensive regulatory intelligence solutions.
  • It is designed to help organizations stay compliant with global regulatory requirements by offering tools and insights for managing regulatory processes.

name: Single Spa polyglot project
description:
This is a polyglot Single-Spa root configuration application (built on vanilla js) designed to orchestrate multiple microfrontend applications.
  • It works in conjunction with eleven other repositories, each representing a microfrontend.
  • Together, they form a modular and scalable application architecture.
  • Each microfrontend can be developed, updated, and deployed independently.
  • This enables seamless integration and efficient maintenance.

name: Single Spa Angular project
description:
This is a angular Single-Spa root configuration application designed to orchestrate multiple microfrontend applications.
  • It works in conjunction with eleven other repositories, each representing a microfrontend.
  • Together, they form a modular and scalable application architecture.
  • Each microfrontend can be developed, updated, and deployed independently.
  • This enables seamless integration and efficient maintenance.

name: Angular with Docker
description:
Creating angular 17 project without installing anything in host machine with the help of docker.
  • It uses Docker to create a containerized Angular development environment with being installed at host machine.

name: Infinite Scroll
description:
This is a simple infinite scroll card application built using Angular Material.
  • It demonstrates the concept of infinite scrolling, where new mat cards & mat table rows are loaded as the user scrolls down.
  • It is a responsive design that works on all devices.
  • It is built using Angular Material, Angular Flex Layout, and Angular CDK.

name: Currency Exchange Rate
description:
Currency exchange rate application built using Deno Fresh framework.
  • It fetches the latest currency exchange rates from 'currencyscoop' API.
  • It is hosted on Deno Deploy.

name: Nokia Snake Game
description:
This is a mini game to learn about webassembly with the help of rust language. The concept is running old Nokia Snake game in web using rust.
  • It is built using Rust and WebAssembly.
  • It is a simple game where the player controls a snake to eat food and grow longer.
  • It is a fun and educational project to learn about Rust and WebAssembly.

name: Angular with Pug
description:
This is a simple Angular project built using Pug template engine.
  • It demonstrates how to use Pug with Angular to create a clean and efficient codebase.
  • It is a responsive design that works on all devices.
  • It is built using Angular, Pug, and SCSS.

name: AR Flix
description:
AR Flix is a movie database application built using Angular and 'themoviedb' API. If application doesn't load properly, please connect to VPN with USA location, As the API is not available in other region sometimes.
  • It fetches the latest movies and TV shows from The Movie Database API.
  • It is a responsive design that works on all devices.
  • It is built using Angular, Angular Material, and The Movie Database API.
